title: 19: Dorothy Sayers, or "THE TRIVIUM - REDUX"
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Dorothy Sayers' "Lost Tools of Learning" is the article that helped to form a movement. We talk through it in this episode, and we end up talking a little more trivium while we're at it.
itunes:author: Bees, Graeme, & A.J.
itunes:subtitle: We talk through the famous Dorothy Sayers article that started it all.
itunes:summary: Dorothy Sayers' "Lost Tools of Learning" is the article that helped to form a movement. We talk through it in this episode, and we end up talking a little more trivium while we're at it.
